short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Sephora to check if products have pore clogging ingredients

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension reads the ingredients of a product in Sephora and checks for any pore-clogging ingredients. The extension is useful to users as it provides a quick check without having to copy and paste the ingredients and navigate to other sites. 

Just click the "check" button and the product name will appear in red if any pore-clogging ingredients are present. 

Disclaimer: Only highly comedogenic ingredients will be identified.
